thread.title: 2 EMPLOYERS @ THE SANCTUARY FORCED MAIDS TO DO DANGEROUS WINDOW CLEANING
thread.title_full: 2 EMPLOYERS @ THE SANCTUARY FORCED MAIDS TO DO DANGEROUS WINDOW CLEANING

author: farhan
title: 2 EMPLOYERS @ THE SANCTUARY FORCED MAIDS TO DO DANGEROUS WINDOW CLEANING
text:
2 EMPLOYERS @ THE SANCTUARY FORCED MAIDS TO DO DANGEROUS WINDOW CLEANING   Tue, 21/02/2017 - 11:30pm Advertisement 
2 employers from the same condominium, The Sanctuary at Tanjong Rhu, were caught making their maids perform dangerous window cleaning stunts today. 
Two clips were sent by a concerned netizen who said that the maids were made to perch precariously outside of the windows on a small ledge. One of the maids was forced to clean a window. The other was made to tend to a flower bed that was growing on the ledge. 
These are not the first time such acts have happened.
